name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@torontobigface I'm going to criticize you. Old men and women who rely on medical insurance to get medicine and see doctors every day and spend every penny carefully don't understand medical insurance reform. A group of patriotic KOLs in their thirties and forties who have only been to the hospital a few times in their lives and whose closest prescription medicine is Viagra, don't understand what medical insurance reform is.
During the epidemic, these people kept saying "what should we do with the elderly and children?" Now the elderly really have problems, and they are playing word games with you.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: During the day on the 16th, at the Dalian Qingniwaqiao subway station, some people were still protesting against the medical insurance reform and singing the Internationale

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Experts warn that if the birth rate continues to be low, the retirement age may continue to be postponed
People in the comment section showed their firm determination not to have children.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
At the site where Ningbo University used to do nucleic acid testing, there is a "New Coronavirus Memorial Column" on the wall.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submissions
Today, a large number of Jiangsu netizens submitted messages saying that they received text messages from the Jiangsu Provincial Public Security Department, hoping that Apple users would turn off the iMessage function

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Yingtan City unified high school second semester final exam English composition topic: Your friend Tom asked you about the epidemic situation in China. Please write a letter to talk about the current domestic epidemic situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: What does it mean? Shoe repair and key making were not allowed in China a few years ago? How can it return to life?
